mapper.insert: insert into userfile (userFileId, userId, fileId, fileName, filePath, extendName, isDir, uploadTime) value (#{userFileId}, #{userId}, #{fileId}, #{fileName}, #{filePath}, #{extendName}, #{isDir}, #{uploadTime})
mapper.update: update user set userId=#{userId}, fileId=#{fileId}, fileName=#{fileName}, filePath=#{filePath}, extendName=#{extendName}, isDir=#{isDir}, uploadTime=#{uploadTime} where userFileId = #{userFileId}
UPDATE userfile SET filePath=REPLACE(filePath, #{param1}, #{param2}) WHERE filePath like N'${param1}%' and userId = #{param3}
UPDATE userfile SET filepath=REPLACE(filepath, #{oldFilePath}, #{filePath}) WHERE filepath LIKE N'${oldFilePath}%' and userId = #{userId};
mapper.select: SELECT SUM(fileSize) FROM userfile LEFT JOIN file ON file.fileId = userfile.fileId WHERE userfile.userId = #{userId} and deleteFlag = 0
